newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia's IFI eyes $150 mln Eurobond issue.
newsitem.headline: Colombia's IFI eyes $150 mln Eurobond issue.

text.p: Colombia's state-run Industrial Development Institute (IFI) plans to issue an additional $150 million in debt in Europe next year, its president, Gabriel Borrero, said Wednesday.

He said the Eurobond issue, which would be placed through the Luxembourg stock exchange, would be similar to a $125 million debt issue IFI successfully floated in July but that final details had not yet been worked out,
IFI will use the bond issue to increase credit for the restructuring of Colombia's small and mid-sized industries, Borrero said.
